title: Add mainnet wallet transfer signing, blockchain transaction posting, and Segwit transaction broadcasting

requirements.text: Implement cryptographic signing of mainnet Bitcoin wallet transfers for recipients, ensuring the application can sign transactions on behalf of users with proper key management

quotes: Add ability for app to sign mainnet wallet transfer for recipient

acceptanceCriteria: Application can cryptographically sign Bitcoin transactions for mainnet
Signing process properly handles recipient wallet addresses
Private key management is secure and follows best practices

requirements.text: Implement AI-powered transaction posting to blockchain network with automatic confirmation monitoring

quotes: Add ability for app ai to Post and confirm transaction on blockchain network

acceptanceCriteria: Application can post signed transactions to the Bitcoin mainnet
System monitors and confirms transaction inclusion in blocks
AI component tracks transaction status and handles confirmation logic

requirements.text: Add support for sending mainnet transactions to Segwit Bitcoin wallet addresses with automatic fee estimation and reserve-funded fee coverage

quotes: Add app ability to for app to send mainnet transactions to Segwit bitcoin wallets built in mainnet transfer request and broadcast transactions on blockchain network using reserve to cover estimated fees

acceptanceCriteria: Application supports Segwit (P2WPKH and P2WSH) address formats
Transactions include proper fee estimation for mainnet broadcast
Reserve balance is used to cover transaction fees automatically
Transactions are successfully broadcast to the Bitcoin blockchain network

requirements.text: Update frontend transaction status tracking to display signing, posting, and confirmation states for mainnet Segwit transactions
acceptanceCriteria: UI tracks and shows confirmation progress
Segwit transaction details are properly displayed

constraints: Must maintain compatibility with existing Bitcoin credit transfer system
Must preserve existing transaction history and balance tracking
Private key handling must follow security best practices for mainnet operations
Reserve balance must be sufficient before covering transaction fees
nonGoals: Support for non-Segwit legacy address formats beyond what already exists
Support for other cryptocurrencies besides Bitcoin
